DOC.brief_title: Once-daily Simultaneous Modulated Accelerated Thoracic Radiotherapy Limited Small-cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase II randomize study determine whether once-daily ( qd ) simultaneous modulate accelerated thoracic radiotherapy result good survival twice-daily ( bid ) RT patient limited-stage small-cell lung cancer ( LD-SCLC ) . All patient receive four cycle etoposide cisplatin ( EP ) , 3 day ' duration separate 21 day . Thoracic RT initiate first second chemotherapy . Qd RT include delivery 65 Gy 26 fraction deliver weekday total 33 day . Bid RT include delivery 45 Gy 30 fraction deliver weekday total 19 day . After chest RT fourth cycle EP , prophylactic cranial irradiation administer patient complete remission . 204 patient need enrol 80 % power detect improvement 3-year progression-free survival rate expect 25 % 40 % .
